article_title: Into the Breach: What Preparers Tell Clients About ID Theft
article_text: With the revelation that another 220,000 taxpayers may find their identities at risk in the breach of the IRSs Get Transcript application, you may find your clients worried that their identities, their credit scores and maybe their life savings will wind up at the mercy of some free-spending crook.

article_metadata.description: You may find your clients worried that their identities, their credit scores and maybe their life savings will wind up at the mercy of some free-spending crook. What can you tell them?
